alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Morehouse, northeastern Richland and southwestern West Carroll Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Start, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodwill and Darnell around 345 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Oak Ridge and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
